titles.title: 623 Jesus My Lord My God My All (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus my Lord my God my all
Hear me blest Saviour when I call
Hear me and from Thy dwelling place
Pour down the riches of Thy grace

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus my Lord
I Thee adore
O make me love Thee
More and more

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus too late I Thee have sought
How can I love Thee as I ought
And how extol Thy matchless frame
The glorious beauty of Thy name

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Jesus what didst Thou find in me
That Thou hast dealt so lovingly
How great the joy that Thou hast brought
So far exceeding hope or thought

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Jesus of Thee shall be my song
To Thee my heart and soul belong
All that I have or am is Thine
And Thou blest Saviour
Thou art mine
